content.text:
# Chicago Film Critics Association Awards 2021

The 34th Chicago Film Critics Association Awards were announced on December 15, 2021. The awards honor the best in film for 2021. The nominations were announced on December 13, 2021. West Side Story received the most nominations (11), followed by The Power of the Dog (8) and The Green Knight (7).
Winners and nominees
The winners and nominees for the 34th Chicago Film Critics Association Awards are as follows:
, Best Director and Best Adapted Screenplay winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
, Best Original Screenplay winner]]
Awards

!Best Film
!Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
* The Power of the Dog
** Drive My Car
** The Green Knight
** Licorice Pizza
** West Side Story
| valign="top" |
* 'Jane Campion – The Power of the Dog'
** Paul Thomas Anderson – Licorice Pizza
** Ryusuke Hamaguchi – Drive My Car
** David Lowery – The Green Knight
** Steven Spielberg – West Side Story
|-
!Best Actor
!Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Benedict Cumberbatch – The Power of the Dog as Phil Burbank'
** Nicolas Cage – Pig as Robin "Rob" Feld
** Andrew Garfield – tick, tick... BOOM! as Jonathan Larson
** Hidetoshi Nishijima – Drive My Car as Yūsuke Kafuku
** Simon Rex – Red Rocket as Mikey Davies/Saber
| valign="top" |
* 'Kristen Stewart – Spencer as Diana, Princess of Wales'
** Jessica Chastain – The Eyes of Tammy Faye as Tammy Faye Bakker
** Olivia Colman – The Lost Daughter as Leda Caruso
** Alana Haim – Licorice Pizza as Alana Kane
** Agathe Rousselle – Titane as Alexia / Adrien
|-
!Best Supporting Actor
!Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Kodi Smit-McPhee – The Power of the Dog as Peter Gordon'
** Bradley Cooper – Licorice Pizza as Jon Peters
** Colman Domingo – Zola as Abegunde "X" Olawale
** Mike Faist – West Side Story as Riff
** Jeffrey Wright – The French Dispatch as Roebuck Wright
| valign="top" |
* 'Ruth Negga – Passing as Clare Bellew'
** Caitríona Balfe – Belfast as Ma
** Jessie Buckley – The Lost Daughter as Young Leda Caruso
** Ariana DeBose – West Side Story as Anita
** Riley Keough – Zola as Stefani
|-
!Best Original Screenplay
!Best Adapted Screenplay
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Licorice Pizza – Paul Thomas Anderson'
** The Card Counter – Paul Schrader
** The French Dispatch – Wes Anderson
** Pig – Michael Sarnoski
** Red Rocket – Sean Baker and Chris Bergoch
| valign="top" |
* 'The Power of the Dog – Jane Campion'
** Drive My Car – Ryusuke Hamaguchi, Haruki Murakami, and Takamasa Oe
** The Green Knight – David Lowery
** The Lost Daughter – Maggie Gyllenhaal
** West Side Story – Tony Kushner

|-

* Flee
** Belle
** Encanto
** Luca
** The Mitchells vs. the Machines
| valign="top" |
* Drive My Car
** A Hero
** Petite Maman
** Titane
** The Worst Person in the World
|-

!Best Original Score
|-
| valign="top" |
* Summer of Soul (...Or, When the Revolution Could Not Be Televised)
** Flee
** Procession
** The Sparks Brothers
** The Velvet Underground
| valign="top" |
* 'The Power of the Dog – Jonny Greenwood'
** Annette – Ron Mael and Russell Mael
** Dune – Hans Zimmer
** The French Dispatch – Alexandre Desplat
** Spencer – Jonny Greenwood
|-
!Best Art Direction/Production Design
!Best Costume Design
|-
| valign="top" |
* The French Dispatch
** Dune
** The Green Knight
** Nightmare Alley
** West Side Story
| valign="top" |
* 'Spencer – Jacqueline Durran'

** West Side Story – Paul Tazewell
|-
!Best Editing
!Best Cinematography
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'The French Dispatch – Andrew Weisblum'
** Drive My Car – Azusa Yamazaki
** Dune – Joe Walker
** The Power of the Dog – Peter Sciberras
** West Side Story – Michael Kahn and Sarah Broshar
| valign="top" |

** The Green Knight – Andrew Droz Palermo

** West Side Story – Janusz Kamiński

** Annette
** The Green Knight
** Nightmare Alley
** Titane
| valign="top" |
* 'Michael Sarnoski – Pig'
** Maggie Gyllenhaal – The Lost Daughter
** Rebecca Hall – Passing
** Sian Heder – CODA
** Emma Seligman – Shiva Baby
|-
!Most Promising Performer
!
|-

** Emilia Jones – CODA as Ruby Rossi
** Rachel Sennott – Shiva Baby as Danielle
** Rachel Zegler – West Side Story as María
